meanings.sent1: The commendams was a valuable benefice given to the deserving priest.
meanings.sent2: The commendams was passed down from generation to generation in the family.
meanings.sent3: The commendams seemed to have a mind of its own, always bringing good fortune.

meanings.definition: The right of presenting to a benefice.
meanings.sent1: He exercised his commendams by selecting the most qualified candidate for the position.
